scripts.docker:mongo-rs: docker run --rm -d -p 27017:27017 -h $(hostname) --name mongo mongo --replSet=rs && sleep 4 && docker exec mongo mongo --eval 'rs.initiate();'
scripts.test:mongo: yarn docker:mongo-rs && yarn test && yarn docker:drop:mongo-rs
scripts.test: env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' env DATABASE_URL='mongodb://localhost:27017/test?replicaSet=rs' nyc mocha -r ts-node/register 'test/**/*.ts'
